info.title: GitHub Gists
info.description: GitHub Gists enables the authorized user to list, create, update and delete the public gists on GitHub.

get.summary: List gists for the authenticated user
get.description: Lists the authenticated user's gists or if called anonymously, this endpoint returns all public gists:

post.description: Allows you to add a new gist with one or more files.

files.description: Names and content for the files that make up the gist

public.description: Flag indicating whether the gist is public
public.title: Flag

get.description: List public gists sorted by most recently updated to least recently updated.
List the authenticated user's starred gists:

patch.description: Allows you to update a gist's description and to update, delete, or rename gist files. Files from the previous version of the gist that aren't explicitly changed during an edit are unchanged.

files.description: The gist files to be updated, renamed, or deleted. Each `key` must match the current filename (including extension) of the targeted gist file.

content.description: The new content of the file.
content.title: Content

filename.description: The new filename for the file.
filename.title: Filename

get.description: List all comments for a gist.
Retrieve a list of gist commits.
Retrieve a list of gist forks.
Check if a gist is starred.

author-association.title: author_association
author-association.description: How the author is associated with the repository.

total_private_repos.description: The total number of private repos.
total_private_repos.title: Total Private Repos

owned_private_repos.description: The number of owned private repos.
owned_private_repos.title: Owned Private Repos

gist-comment.title: Gist Comment
gist-comment.description: A comment made to a gist.

per-page.name: per_page
per-page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.name: page
page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

since.name: since
since.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

pagination-before.name: before
pagination-before.description: A cursor, as given in the Link header. If specified, the query only searches for results before this cursor.

pagination-after.name: after
pagination-after.description: A cursor, as given in the Link header. If specified, the query only searches for results after this cursor.

gist-id.name: gist_id
gist-id.description: The unique identifier of the gist.

comment-id.name: comment_id
comment-id.description: The unique identifier of the comment.
